text: Sego dnya razreshayutsya vam v pishchu dobryye snedi: pishcha tekh, kotorym dano Pisaniye, razreshena dlya vas; i vasha pishcha razreshena dlya nikh. Razreshayetsya vam brak s vospitannymi pod strogoy okhranoy docheryami veruyushchikh, i s vospitannymi pod strogoy okhranoy docheryami tekh, kotorym prezhde vas dano Pisaniye, kogda dadite im voznagrazhdeniye dlya nikh i budete strogo khranit' sebya, ne rasputnichaya, ne derzha lyubovnits. Kto otvergnet etu veru, togo deyatel'nost' budet tshchetna, a v budushchey zhizni on budet v chisle neschastnykh
